analysis.key_quote: The proposed changes are an attack on the professional and nonpartisan character of the federal workforce and work to undermine the fundamental goal of the Pendleton Act of 1883, viz., to have merit as the foundation of the civil service system.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization, the undermining of merit-based systems, and the potential for retaliation against federal employees, which aligns with the themes of opposition to the rule.
